p: In order to investigate the effect of input parameters and identify the most effective factor, the sensitivity analysis test was performed on the optimal network. The results showed that the shelf life was more effective in predicting the quality and microbial properties than the essential oil concentration in the coatings (Figure 7). The results of this study were similar to those of Sagdic et al. ( 2012); Fernández et al. ( 2010); Yolmeh et al. ( 2014); Alizadeh Behbahani and Imani Fooladi. ( 2018b).
